Malice::
 
he loved her smile, it warmed even the dark corners of his spark.  She had no intention to ever leave him, which was good.  She then reminded him of what they were doing out here in the first place, to find a bot out here, and mentally berated himself for forgetting.  She then suggested they wait and continue to share this moment, and joked that they might have a search party sent after them.  An amusing idea.  But if there was a search party people would worry needlessly, and he didn't want to mess with it.
 
"I suppose we better get going," he said, with a kiss to her faceplates and a smirk of his own.  "We have time to cuddle after we're done."
 
He stands up and and sets her on her feet, but lets his hands travel up her sides and arms.  He rested his hands on her elbows and continued to smile down to her, wondering if she felt the strange muscle like movement in his neck.

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

She opened her optics to look into his.  She smiled at him with all
the warmth in her spark. "Shhhh, don't talk about things now. Just now
that...no matter what, we will always be together, in battle, in base
camp. No matter where the Matrix takes us, I will be there." She
looked lovingly into his optics. Her optics flashed for a moment as
her protocol programs reminded her of something. "THE BOT! Oh no. I
forgot the mission we're on." She was still in his arms, but that look
of self frustration and mild self irritation at one that has let
themselves get caught up in the moment, showed on her face plates. She
looked up at him with a pink tint in her face plates. "Uh, well, erhm,
eh heh. Well, we can stay here a moment or two longer, but at some
point we still have to answer that beacon. Or else they'll send a
search party out for us too."  She kind of smirked at the thought.
"And I can imagine where they'd find us. Under a rock no doubt."  She
smiled up at him. "But then again, that may not be a bad thing." with
a slight chuckle. 


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

		
---------------------------------
